name: Traitor
description:
As part of the Computer Games Design module in my second year of university, we completed 'Game A Week' for 6 weeks. The fourth week's theme was Traitors.

The fourth week's theme was the concept of traitors. My game prototype is a couch co-op minigame that again was created in the Unity game engine using C# scripts.

Please Note: This is a mechanic showcase and not a full game
